text: Marl is a city in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. About 91,000 people live there. == Twin towns == * Bitterfeld, Saxony-Anhalt, Germany * Creil, France * Herzliya, Israel * Zalaegerszeg, Hungary * Pendle, United Kingdom * Kuşadası, Turkey ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Recklinghausen (district)
title: Marl, North Rhine-Westphalia
